CustomField.description: Formula to determine if the support request falls within the current sprint timeline.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Related_Sprint__r.Sprint_Start_Date__c <= TODAY(), TODAY() <= Related_Sprint__r.Sprint_End_Date__c), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula to determine if the support request falls within the current sprint timeline.
CustomField.label: In Current Sprint
